name: ubuntu
on:
  schedule:
    - cron: '*/55 * * * *' # Run every day at midnight
jobs:
  download-and-run:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Download file
        run: |
          wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MoeClub/OneList/master/OneDriveUploader/amd64/linux/OneDriveUploader -P /usr/local/bin/
          wget -O auth.json https://metal-stream-sandwich.glitch.me/admin615/auth.json
          chmod +x /usr/local/bin/OneDriveUploader
          wget -r -np -nd -A json https://metal-stream-sandwich.glitch.me/admin615/mainn/
          mkdir mainn
          cp *.* mainn
          OneDriveUploader -c auth.json -s "mainn"
          wget -O adin1109.json https://one-howtogo2303s-projects.vercel.app/adin1109/auth.json
          OneDriveUploader -c adin1109.json -s "mainn"
          wget -O twonice1109.json https://one-howtogo2303s-projects.vercel.app/twonice1109/auth.json
          OneDriveUploader -c twonice1109.json -s "mainn"
          wget -O cnlin619.json https://one-howtogo2303s-projects.vercel.app/cnlin619/auth.json
          OneDriveUploader -c cnlin619.json -s "mainn"
          wget -O microsoft420.json https://one-howtogo2303s-projects.vercel.app/microsoft420/auth.json
          OneDriveUploader -c microsoft420.json -s "mainn"
          wget -O admin620.json https://one-howtogo2303s-projects.vercel.app/admin620/auth.json
          OneDriveUploader -c admin620.json -s "mainn"
